experiences.title: Developer
experiences.subtitle: Mouser Electronics, Mansfield TX
workDescription: Designed and deployed monitoring scripts across 600 servers, capturing netstat details and server statistics.
Utilized Zabbix for automated health monitoring and alerting, enabling rapid response to server degradation.
Streamlined troubleshooting processes by leveraging netstat data for efficient diagnostics and issue resolution.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Intel Corporation, California, US
workDescription: Worked on Intel’s oneAPI UI Interface, where user’s can perform job submission, track them and launch Computer nodes for workshops.
Worked on slurm interface REST APIs to submit a job, and check the status of the job on the front end. Through the interface, faculty can trigger compute nodes that can scale up to 200 nodes.
Implemented notebooks to run ML and High Power Computing (HPC) jobs in the Jupyter lab

experiences.title: Web Operation Intern
experiences.subtitle: Mouser Electronics, Mansfield TX
workDescription: Migrating legacy PHP code to Python which removes scaling issues for the existing application and synchronizes millions of objects.
Refactored the code to scale the application and accommodate vendor API key constraints without disturbing the existing volume and throughput.

experiences.title: Project Intern
experiences.subtitle: Paragon Dynamics and Info Systems
workDescription: Developed a web-application using Python Flask that overcomes the hazels faced by faculties in a classroom. Deployed a Face Recognition based attendance system on Raspberry Pi to capture live attendance.
Designed an NLP based Answer script evaluator.
